name: Inter-University Cricket Championship 2025
summary: A multi-university cricket tournament featuring 16 teams across the region, focusing on student athletes and talent scouting.

name: State Youth Football Cup 2025
summary: State-level youth football cup with district winners from across the state competing for the title.

name: Regional Badminton Open 2025
summary: Open-level tournament for regional players; points distribution for national ranking hopefuls.

name: City Half Marathon 2025
summary: Mass participation half-marathon open to clubs and public with timed results and charity drives.

name: Inter-Club Fitness Challenge 2025
summary: A two-day strength and endurance contest between local gyms and fitness academies.

name: Regional Track Cycling Meet 2025
summary: Track cycling meet with sprint and endurance events for regional riders and clubs.

name: State Aquatics Championship 2025
summary: State-level aquatics event covering multiple swimming strokes and age categories.

name: District Kabaddi League 2025
summary: District-level kabaddi league focusing on grassroots players and scouts.

name: National Yoga Fest 2025
summary: Three-day national festival featuring workshops, competitions and community sessions for yoga practitioners.

name: Inter-Collegiate Basketball Trophy 2025
summary: Inter-collegiate tournament for regional colleges to showcase basketball talent and scouting.

name: Open Rapid Chess Championship 2025
summary: Open rapid-format chess event attracting national and international titled players.

name: City Table Tennis Open 2025
summary: City open table tennis competition for club and school players, with coaching clinics.
